column4: Hi, I have a problem. When I set a gateway address for eth0 (local home network), it also effects ppp0 and I am not able to browse using my dial-up connection. Can someone help?

not really sure but ppp0 is DSL right? if so you have to "dial" into the connection with a password.. if you've setup your box to do that then if you have a router make the router do the connection for you.. most will
aarrgg. that I don't know how to fix..sorry.
np.. maybe ubottu has an answer.. I'll see if there's a link.
